LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk.label: cook fine meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk.description: Cook 4 somewhat complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cook a very complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk.label: cook lavish meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk.description: Cook 4 very complex meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cook a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleBulk.label: cook simple meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleBulk.description: Cook 4 straightforward meals from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.description: Prepare a packaged survival meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalBulk.label: cook packaged survival meal x4
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalBulk.description: Prepare 4 packaged survival meals from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
